name: Dhiraj Pillay
my_business: Perfume24x7 is India’s trusted online destination for 100% authentic international perfumes. We bring luxury fragrances from world-renowned brands such as Giorgio Armani, Burberry, Valentino, Bvlgari, Salvatore Ferragamo, Coach, and Jimmy Choo directly to our customers’ doorstep.
top_product: 1. For Individual Buyers Luxury perfumes from world-renowned brands such as Giorgio Armani, Burberry, Valentino, Bvlgari, Salvatore Ferragamo, Coach, and Jimmy Choo – perfect for those seeking a signature fragrance for everyday wear, evenings, or special occasions. 2. For Gift Seekers Exclusive gift sets from premium brands and curated perfume hampers – designed for birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, and festive gifting. Elegant packaging makes them memorable, premium gifts. 3. For Corporate Gifting A wide range of branded perfumes available across all budgets – from ₹200 to ₹50,000 – ideal for employee rewards, client appreciation, festive hampers, and executive gifting.
ideal_referral: Who We Work With (Ideal Referrals): Individuals seeking luxury perfumes for personal use Professionals wanting a signature scent to stand out Gifting customers – birthdays, anniversaries, weddings, festivals Corporate HRs looking for premium employee gifting solutions Event planners / wedding planners needing luxury gift hampers
top_problem_solved: Most customers struggle with: Fear of fake perfumes – Marketplaces and offline shops often sell counterfeits. Confusion in choosing the right fragrance – With hundreds of options, buyers don’t know what suits them. Lack of premium gifting options – Especially for corporates and events, where a classy, memorable gift is needed. We at Perfume24x7 solve this by offering 100% authentic international perfumes, personalized recommendations, and luxury gift solutions across all budgets.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favourite BNI moments started when a member bought a perfume for himself. He appreciated the authenticity and service so much that he referred me to his friends, and soon their circle began reaching out for gifts on birthdays, anniversaries, and festivals. What struck me was not just the sales—it was the perspective: when you focus on building trust one person at a time, opportunities naturally multiply. That shift in thinking has changed the way I now approach challenges in business and beyond.

name: Ragini Warde
top_product: Herbal Teas, Premium Strong Darjeeling Teas, Flavoured Green Teas, Oolong Teas, and Freeze-Dried Fruit Blends. Customisations available according to customer requirement.
ideal_referral: Hotels, Hospitals, Cafes, Restaurants, Resorts, Corporate Offices, Government Offices, Hostels, Colleges, Schools, Canteens, Co-working Spaces, Manufacturing Units, IT Companies, Retail Stores, Event Catering Companies, Cloud Kitchens, Bakeries, Mess Facilities, Banquet Halls, Travel Lounges, Airports, Railway Stations, Bus Depots, Clubs, Fitness Centres, Salons & Spas, Real Estate Builders (sample flats), Packaging/Gifting Companies, Tiffin Services, and Large Housing Societies.
top_problem_solved: At Anand Tea Company, we brew better solutions. No more coloured teas—just pure, bold blends. No more bitter green tea—only smooth herbal infusions you’ll love hot or cold. No more inconsistent café tea—our blends ensure the same taste in every cup. We help businesses upgrade their tea quality without increasing their budget.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is when a local café owner, referred through a chapter member, told us he was losing customers because his tea tasted different every day. His budget was tight, but his expectations were high. We studied his menu, his customer flow, and even his brewing style. Then we created a customised tea blend—within his existing budget—that guaranteed consistent taste and better aroma. Within just a few weeks, his customer complaints turned into compliments, his repeat orders increased, and tea became one of his highest-selling items. That moment reminded me why I value BNI so much: the referrals aren’t just names—they’re opportunities to create real results. When quality improves, sales follow.

We are also a Distributor for Hettich Hardware a Germany based hardware  all our installation uses Hettich fittings only. And we offer 10 Year product warranty for all the products executed by us.

name: Rana Bhaumik
my_business:
We are the premier Consultants and Advisors in areas of Risk Management , Reputation Management , Family Business Advisory where we evaluates businesses for their Purpose, People, Process and Technology and reposition itself for Growth, Profitability and Sustainability. We focus on the:
a.  MS&ME Sector,
b.  Business Owner - Sole Proprietor, Partners, Promoters, Directors,
c.  Family Businesses (First Generation, Second Generation and beyond
Having worked in Risk, Audit and Governance functions at General Electric, Ford Motor Company, Cummins and Dr. Reddy's, we tailor Global Solutions to address Domestic Requirements.
top_product: 1. Enterprise Risk Management (ERM), 2. Driving Accountability in the Organisation, 3. Strategic Human Capital Management, 4. Family Business Advisories, 5. Risk Based Internal Audit
ideal_referral: Families in Business across generations who are facing challenges in areas of: 1. succession planning (both at family and business level), 2. transparent disclosures within the family (about business, finance, risks etc), 3. inclusivity as the family expands, 4. aspiration management of family members - direct and relatives, 5. legacy and wealth management, 6. monetisation of assets/family jewels so that there is minimal of legal and financial challenges 7. professionalisation of management at the businesses run by the families 8. similar aspects
top_problem_solved: a. For a Business School, addressed strategic issues around designing and positioning of their offerings to the external world as well improve the productivity of their teaching and non teaching staff: b. For a US based Company, which is a leading player in Maritime Emergency Response, streamlined their financial, operational and asset management aspects by addressing and fixing problems related to their Indian entity in areas involving Companies Act, Income Tax Act, GST, Customs Act, FEMA etc. Total outgo in the last 10 years of my association with them on account of Interest and Penalties for non compliance has been Rs. 12 lakhs as compared to Rs. 6 crores when I took over as their Internal Auditor from the previous consultant. Of this Rs. 6 Crore, we have received Rs, 3 crores as refund as well: 3. For a Rs. 600 crore Company, addressed their Human Capital related challenges so that their turnover/attrition at Senior and Middle Management has reduced from 25% to 5% across 2 years.
my_favourite_bni_story: 1. Consulted a jewelry manufacturing business during COVID lockdown on their organsiational structure, delegation of work, KRAs and KPIs. process mapping etc. Completed the work in 9 months in spite of the lockdown. Operational efficiency and Organisation Dynamics improved by 15% as much did profitability. 2. After 3 years during which the business is now on auto pilot, I have been invited by the same jewelry company to join their Board of Directors. 3. The US parent of one of my clients, has appointed me as an businesses advisor for their Middle East and Asia Pacific operations that includes operations in India, Singapore, Dubai, Shanghai and South Africa
